data.title: Violence
data.text:
There's a lot of violence in the world. Pathetic humans are so aggressive. World became so deadly.
What you were thinking when created such of a fatal tech?

comments.text: But what you thinking now? These... machines. It's not in our hands.
You're the most offencive here, you know?
The world starting to decade. It's unavoidable
Now the whole districts falling in ashes! Better to hide somewhere to create the plan.
It's fine unless the moment that will destroy everything and everyone

data.title: Layers?
data.text:
How much the layer can reveal? Nothing!
But what if I say that there're more then one layer here. What then?

comments.text: Wow, I haven't even noticed that!!
Finally NEKO getting her hands on something big and funny
I̷n̷t̶e̷r̸e̴s̶t̴i̷n̴g̴ ̴b̸u̶t̵ ̷w̶h̵e̵r̸e̸ ̴i̵s̶ ̵i̵t̷?̴
HA! I know the truth behind it anyway, you're too predictable!
